text: Ate maumina auratam nu akho ki uha apani'am nazaram nivi'am rakhana ate apane gupata agam di rakhi'a karana ate apani khubasurati nu pragata na karana. Bina usa tom jihara (acanaka) zahira ho jave. Ate apani'am cuni'am nala apani'am chati'am dhaka ke rakhana ate apani khubasurati nu pragata na karana. Para (bina) apane pati, apane pita, apane sahura, apane putaram, pati de putaram “te bharavam ate bhatiji'am'te bhanaji'am “te apane jihi'am auratam “te apani'am dasi'am te apane adhina uha adami jihare aurata di icha nahim rakhade “te ajihe bace jihare auratam di'am parade di'am galam aje nahim janade. Iha apane paira zamina te jora nala na marana ki usa di avaza nala unham di chipi ho'i sudarata pragata ho jave. He imana vali'o! Tusim sare milake alaha vala muro tauba karo, tam ki tusim safalata prapata karo
